com.whaleal.mars.core.query

类 TextCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.query.TextCriteria
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CriteriaDefinition

    public class TextCriteria
extends Object
implements CriteriaDefinition
    Implementation of CriteriaDefinition to be used for full text search.
